name: One Shot (Cool Steel Breeze)
description:
One Shot is a game designed for the GMTK Game Jam 2019. One Shot is very simple. One screen, one hit, one life, one button, one bullet.

Try your best to get a highscore in this endless arcade game.

WASD- To Move

Mouse - To Aim

Space- Fire

(Hold on to bullet to do a charge shot)
